title: High School Wing Supervisor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give someone a detention slip each day. The next night, they may still perform their night ability, however if they do then all REFs and NKs will learn their role and action as soon as it is submitted.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host may not be late. All actions submitted 24 hours after the phase begins will be invalidated.
- The host is sent to detention if the phase ends more than 6 hours after the given time, and all feedback given for the next phase is relayed to you. Or the host can be a goodie two-shoes, stay in detention and not give out feedback.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose.

desc:
Post 3407
*You're late! Go back, sign in with the office, get a late pass.. no running in the halls! Detention for you!*
